"Hilda":
"Alright, enough warming up.
Let's move on to combat basics."

"Summoners control their Pets by using a Takt.
The Takt is used to give instructions to
their pets, thus the Pet does the attacking instead.

Pressing <%NormalAttack> orders the Pet to perform
a normal attack."
